title: Looking for new people to play with and possible someone to help me learn ADC
body:
Hi all.
I'm currently looking to make some new friends and play a few games. I'm also looking for someone to possible teach me to play ADC well as its my worst role by far. Dont care what rank you are to play with ( in norms )  but if you are able to help me with my ADC progression I would like someone who can show they know the role.

Im fairly easy going, super chill, just happy go lucky ( And i love to talk..haha )

So if you would like to play a few games and have a chat, add me  IGN: shdwzone

Cheers Shdw {{champion:432}} ^_^

replies.body: hi my friend is a main adc he carry alot of games i thnk he can help you

Sure ^_^ that would be great. He can either add me IG or leave his IGN here and ill add him. 

Cheers Shdw
This is his name Gietcuop he is silver 5 and other account silver too Spatar Cus{{champion:222}}
